reviewText: My 4 year old loves roller coasters. He received this DVD for Christmas and we intended to get him the full set.  However then I heard the vulgar commentator compare a tunnel to the female genitalia.  The market for people who would be offended by this is much larger than the people who enjoy such derogatory language - not a good business move fellas.  We returned the DVD and are warning others not to buy it.  This DVD series needs to include a strong warning about sexually offensive language.
Service was excellent but DVD was terrible.  Didn't even feel like you were on a roller coaster.  Kids were bored very quickly
Got this for my son.  He loves it! Came in a timely manner and just as advertised.

I have almost the entire series of these Roller Coasters in the Raw DVD's and love them. I have yet to check out this newest edition (it JUST arrived!), but Robb does a great job between great off-ride footage, near perfect POV's (mostly uses mounted camera's as opposed to ridiculous shaky hand-held footage), hilarious commentary (some PG-13 stuff, beware if you have small kids!), and sometimes shots of him and his friends ON the ride itself. If you like coasters, these DVD's are a must. Easily the closest you can get to actually riding without doing so, and for the amount of content you get, a very reasonable price. While I wish I got to ride all of these coasters myself, we can enjoy riding along with TPR from the comfort of our couch with these awesome DVD's. Score! :)
Love it!  What awesome footage and so professionally done!  A MUST for any coaster fan!
fun to see cool roller coasters from around the globe. Beware, however, some people may get a little sick while watching the coasters' POV! =)
